languages.text: {n}Удивительно, но голос, исходящий из глотки чудовищной машины, звучит восторженно, почти зачарованно.{/n} "Вот оно... место нашего рождения. Номос происходят отсюда".
{n}The voice coming from the maw of the monstrous machine sounds strangely excited — enchanted, even:{/n} "This is it... The place of our origin. Nomos were born here."
languages.original_text: {n}Удивительно, но голос, исходящий из глотки чудовищной машины, звучит восторженно, почти зачарованно.{/n} "Вот оно... место нашего рождения. Номос происходят отсюда".

traits.locale_text: {n}The voice coming from the maw of the monstrous machine sounds excited — enchanted, even.{/n} "Here it is... The place of our origin. Nomos was born here."
{n}The voice coming from the maw of the monstrous machine sounds excited — enchanted, even.{/n} "Here it is... The place of our origin. Nomos was born here."
{n}Oddly enough, the voice coming from the maw of the monstrous machine sounds excited—enchanted, even.{/n} "Here it is... The place of our origin. Nomos were born here."
{n}Oddly enough, the voice coming from the maw of the monstrous machine sounds excited—enchanted, even.{/n} "Here it is... The place of our origin. Nomos were born here."
{n}The voice coming from the maw of the monstrous machine sounds strangely excited — enchanted, even:{/n} "This is it... The place of our origin. Nomos were born here."
{n}The voice coming from the maw of the monstrous machine sounds strangely excited — enchanted, even:{/n} "This is it... The place of our origin. Nomos were born here."

languages.text: {n}La voix qui sort de la gueule de la machine monstrueuse semble étrangement excitée, voire enchantée.{/n} « Nous y sommes... Le lieu de nos origines. Nous sommes nés ici. »
languages.original_text: {n}The voice coming from the maw of the monstrous machine sounds strangely excited — enchanted, even:{/n} "This is it... The place of our origin. Nomos were born here."

traits.locale_text: {n}Étrangement, la voix qui sort de la gueule de la machine monstrueuse semble excitée, voire enchantée.{/n} « Nous y sommes... Le lieu de nos origines. Nous sommes nés ici. »

languages.text: {n}La voz que emana de las fauces de la monstruosa máquina suena sorprendentemente emocionada, ilusionada incluso.{/n} «Aquí es... De aquí provenimos. Nomos nacimos aquí».
languages.original_text: {n}The voice coming from the maw of the monstrous machine sounds strangely excited — enchanted, even:{/n} "This is it... The place of our origin. Nomos were born here."

traits.locale_text: {n}Por extraño que parezca, la voz que emana de las fauces de la monstruosa máquina suena emocionada, ilusionada incluso.{/n} «Aquí es... De aquí provenimos. Nomos nació aquí».

languages.text: {n}这台巨型机器发出的声音听起来莫名地兴奋，甚至仿佛入迷一般。{/n}“这里是……我们诞生的地方。诺莫斯就是在这里诞生的。”
languages.original_text: {n}The voice coming from the maw of the monstrous machine sounds strangely excited — enchanted, even:{/n} "This is it... The place of our origin. Nomos were born here."

traits.locale_text: {n}令你感到古怪的是，这台巨型机器发出的声音听起来很兴奋，甚至仿佛入迷一般。{/n}“这里是……我们诞生的地方。诺莫斯就是在这里诞生的。”

languages.text: {n}Die Stimme, die aus dem Schlund der monströsen Maschine kommt, klingt merkwürdig aufgeregt — bezaubert gar.{/n} "Es ist so weit ... Das ist der Ort unserer Herkunft. Hier wurden Nomos geboren."
languages.original_text: {n}The voice coming from the maw of the monstrous machine sounds strangely excited — enchanted, even:{/n} "This is it... The place of our origin. Nomos were born here."

traits.locale_text: {n}Merkwürdigerweise klingt die Stimme, die aus dem Schlund der monströsen Maschine kommt, aufgeregt — bezaubert gar.{/n} "Das ist er ... Das ist der Ort unserer Herkunft. Hier wurden Nomos geboren."

languages.text: {n}怪物のような機械のマウから聞こえてくる声は、奇妙に興奮しており…魅了されているようにさえ聞こえた。{/n}「ここだ…我々の起源となる場所。ノモスはここで生まれた」
languages.original_text: {n}The voice coming from the maw of the monstrous machine sounds strangely excited — enchanted, even:{/n} "This is it... The place of our origin. Nomos were born here."

traits.locale_text: {n}怪物のような機械のマウから聞こえてくる声は、奇妙に興奮しており…魅了されているようにさえ聞こえた。{/n}「ここだ…我々の起源となる場所。ノモスはここで生まれた」

languages.text: {n}Korkunç makinenin ağzından yükselen ses; ilginç bir biçimde heyecanlı, hatta mest olmuş gibi geliyor.{/n} "İşte burası... Kökenimiz buradan geliyor. Nomos burada doğdu."
languages.original_text: {n}The voice coming from the maw of the monstrous machine sounds strangely excited — enchanted, even:{/n} "This is it... The place of our origin. Nomos were born here."
